Günter Baum (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke n'ihu ọha, onye guzobere ozi abụọ nke Ndị Kraịst na Germany.
Nzukọ mbụ nke Baum guzobere bụ Wüstenstrom, nke bụ akụkụ nke òtù ndị na-edina nwoke
Ihe omume nke nzukọ ahụ dabeere na mmemme US Desert Stream Ministries, ọ bụ ezie na otu ahụ agbanweela nkà ihe ọmụma ya
Baum mechara guzobe otu nzukọ a na-akpọ Zwischenraum
Zwischenraum abụghị akụkụ nke ndị na-emebu nwoke idina nwoke, ndị mmekọ anaghị anwa ịgbanwe omume mmekọahụ nke onye ọ bụla
Kama nke ahụ, Zwischenraum na-anabata ndị LGBT dị ka ha dị, ma na-enyere ndị LGBT nwere nkwenkwe nkà mmụta okpukpe nke ozi ọma aka ime ka akụkụ abụọ a nwere ike ịlụ ọgụ nke njirimara ha.
Taa, Baum na-ebi dị ka nwoke na-edina nwoke n'ihu ọha na nso Basel, Switzerland.
